input_args.passage: 'Bio | Anthony Doerr was born and raised in Cleveland, Ohio. He is the author of the story collections The Shell Collector and Memory Wall, the memoir Four Seasons ...'
input_args.claim: 'From source, we learn that Anthony Doerr was born and raised in Cleveland, Ohio, and is an author who has written story collections like "The Shell Collector" and "Memory Wall", and a memoir "Four Seasons".'
